div.p: Codes describing the location(s) of primary or secondary cancer. The value set includes all codes from the SNOMED-CT body structure hierarchy (codes descending from 123037004 'Body Structure'). The cancer body location may also be expressed using ICD-O-3 topography codes, however, those codes are not included here due to intellectual property restrictions. No other code systems are considered conformant.

description.value: Codes describing the location(s) of primary or secondary cancer. The value set includes all codes from the SNOMED-CT body structure hierarchy (codes descending from 123037004 'Body Structure'). The cancer body location may also be expressed using ICD-O-3 topography codes, however, those codes are not included here due to intellectual property restrictions. No other code systems are considered conformant.
